hit_dmg_u: %1$s use his beak and pierce your %2$s, covering it in red liquid!
hit_dmg_npc: %1$s use his beak and pierce <npcname>, covering them in red liquid!
miss_msg_u: %1$s use his beak and tries to pierce at your %2$s, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s use his beak and tries to pierce at <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s use his beak and try to pierce your %2$s, covering the armor in red liquid!
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s use his beak and try to pierce <npcname>, covering their armor in red liquid!

hit_dmg_u: %1$s face opens and arms fly from it, hitting your %2$s!
hit_dmg_npc: %1$s face opens and arms fly from it, hitting <npcname>!
miss_msg_u: %1$s face opens and arms fly from it, trying to hit your %2$s, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s face opens and arms fly from it, trying to hit <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s face opens and arms fly from it, hitting your %2$s, but your armor do its job!
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s face opens and arms fly from it, hitting <npcname>, but his armor do its job!

miss_msg_u: %1$s run over your %2$s, but you dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s run over your %2$s, but your armor do its job!
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s run over <npcname>, but his armor do its job!

miss_msg_u: %1$s slams into you, trying to hit your %2$s, but you dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s slams into you, hitting your %2$s, but your armor do its job!
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s slams into <npcname>, but his armor do its job!
